titleStmt.title: A iournall, and relation of the action, vvhich by his Maiesties commandement Edvvard Lord Cecyl, Baron of Putney, and Vicount of Wimbledon, Admirall, and Lieutenant Generall of his Maiestyes forces, did vndertake vpon the coast of Spaine, 1625
titleStmt.author: Wimbledon, Edward Cecil, Viscount, 1572-1638.
